title: I just got a 10 match chat restriction
body: I'm glad to see the system actually works, i had been going a little too far recently {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body:
GODS A PERSON WHO APPRECIATES AND UNDERSTANDS THE BAN SYSTEM!
HA!
MY MEANING OF LIFE IS OVER!
I CAN NOW REST KNOWING ATLEAST 1 PERSON THINKS THE GAME WORKS!
Well, whether the game itself works is another discussion entirely... But at least the player behaviour monitoring actually does it jobs!
